abstract: The memorial for Steve Jobs on the Stanford University campus Sunday night featured an intimate series of tributes from friends, colleagues and family.

lead_paragraph: The memorial for Steve Jobs on the Stanford University campus Sunday night featured an intimate series of tributes from friends, colleagues and family.

headline.main: Emotion, Music and Humor at Steve Jobs Memorial
